thread.title: Hey Judge Gorsuch, we fixed your résumé for you
thread.title_full: Hey Judge Gorsuch, we fixed your résumé for you

author: USATODAY College
title: Hey Judge Gorsuch, we fixed your résumé for you
text:
SEND EMAIL 
When President Trump announced that he was nominating Judge Neil Gorsuch to the Supreme Court, among the many reactions on social media was the observation that the résumé the White House put out on the judge was a little … meh. A White House staffer just distributed this fact sheet on Judge Gorsuch pic.twitter.com/IitEGnzKCD 
— Hunter Walker (@hunterw) February 1, 2017 This is not a fact sheet. This is a poorly formatted resume. https://t.co/Gjjc1sOOV8 
— Lori Lodes (@loril) February 1, 2017 @hunterw that looks like a second year assoc. resume
